data.quote: The mexicans are born wherever th f..k we want to
data.author: Chabela Vargas

data.quote: I prefer to live being a slave of the principles, not of men.
data.author: Emiliano Zapata

data.quote:
As high is the high sky
as deep is the deep sea
no barrier is in the world
that my deep love won't break for you
data.author: Cafe Tacuba

data.quote: The culture ends where the barbecue starts
data.author: Jose Vasconcelos

data.quote: For my race, my spirit shall speak
data.author: Jose Vasconcelos

data.quote: The responsibility of my acts might live as the consecuencies of them will do
data.author: Alvaro Obregon

data.quote: I prefer paying first to a teacher than to a general
data.author: Francisco Villa

data.quote: It is my life, my son; how you call it replies: ask for the best and you will get it, ask the worst and you will get it
data.author: Miguel Angel Cornejo

data.quote: May your life be as awesome as you pretend it is on instagram
data.author: Gary

data.quote:
Que descansada la vida
De aquel que huye del mundanal ruido
y sigue la escondida senda por dónde han ido
los poco sabios que en el mundo han sido.
data.author: Fray Luis de León

data.quote: Run until you can't run anymore, and then run again. Constant effort is life's greatest shortcut.
data.author: Julio Fernández

data.quote: Cheer up! Life will get better! Or it will get worse and today won't seem so bad.
data.author: Ruben Cardenas
